mapper.sql: ID, ParentID, FormName, TabHeaderText, SortCode, Remark, Status
mapper.insert: insert into Menus (ParentID, FormName, TabHeaderText, SortCode, Remark, Status) values ( #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{formname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tabheadertext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortcode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT})

mapper.update:
update Menus
ParentID = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FormName = #{formname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TabHeaderText = #{tabheadertext,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SortCode = #{sortcode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update Menus set ParentID = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FormName = #{formname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TabHeaderText = #{tabheadertext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SortCode = #{sortcode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT [ID] ,[ParentID],[FormName],[TabHeaderText],[SortCode] ,[Remark] ,[Status] FROM [RABC].[dbo].[Menus] where 1=1
and FormName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{formname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and TabHeaderText LIKE CONCAT('%',#{tabheadertext,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
ORDER BY 1 OFFSET 10*(#{pageIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}-1) ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER} ROWS ONLY

SELECT Count(ID) FROM [RABC].[dbo].[Menus] where 1=1
and FormName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{formname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and TabHeaderText LIKE CONCAT('%',#{tabheadertext,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
